patthana8.34:1.1_0: Nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:1.1_1: Nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:1.1_2: Nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:2.1_0: Naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:2.1_1: Naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:2.1_2: Naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:3.1_0: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:3.1_1: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:3.1_2: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.34:4.1_1: adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
